clues.text: Typical features in northern cities include open-air bazaars & these Islamic houses of worship

This hot, dusty wind blows out of Africa into southern Europe

Symbol appearing on the Israeli flag

rounds.comments: (Alex: All of the correct responses will begin with that letter of the alphabet.)

rounds.text: In an 1840s work, this British author wrote, "Ah! Vanitas Vanitatum! which of us is happy in this world?"
